Review.Titre: Quality Product, that Could be Improved
Review.Contenu: The Ultra Supply Co "Watch Band Organizer Case for Apple Watch Ultra Travel Pouch" is a well made product and I'm pleased with both the design concept and color. It appears to do a good job of holding up to five (5) watch bands in a single pouch so I don't have them floating free in my sock drawer, my watch storage case, or on top of my dresser. However, the length of the watch bands that the case will accept is somewhat limited. For example, an Apple Braided Solo Loop Watch band (or similar solid straight length design) that requires a Size 10 or 11 length band will fit; but a Size 12 will not. If the case were 1/4-inch longer, that problem would not exist. Also, the case is designed to be folded 3 or 4 times so it stays compact. I like that concept, but they did not allow for fold "zones" between the individual watch band slots. Therefore a portion of 2 or more watch band slots has to be devoted to a fold zone. I currently have 3 bands stored with empty slots between, so I currently have no problem with fold zones. But adding a 4th and/or 5th watch band will make the folding a more challenging situation. That said, I still like the product and will use it until I find something that better fits my needs.

Not only does the band match my Ultra 2 perfectly, it compliments it as well. I'm a "real" watch guy dipping his toe in, and I rarely wear a bracelet, but the Ultra Supply co. Ti band is an ideal match. I can wear it in the pool as well as at work. The inverted end-links make the bracelet drape well and the links have a great amount of articulation without being sloppy or jangly.If I were to identify areas for improvement, the clasp needs work. Two holes of microadjust simply aren't enough. I also understand why the links are pin-and-collar instead of screws. I am a pocket knife guy as well and I've seen stripped-out Ti scales from screws far harder than Ti being used. It's still pin-and-collar, though; there MUST be a better way. These two deficits are why I'm at 4 stars. Fix those, and this easily becomes a 5-star band.

Everything as expected!Good quality.I deducted one point because the cover of the Apple Watch could not be attached without air bubbles. I received two pieces, but both had the same air cushion after installing it.
In general, not bad, one side has a little bigger backlash.

I received my watch band before the estimated delivery date.  The band had the high quality that I was expecting.  I subtracted one star because it was very difficult for me to put the band on my new watch before I realized that I had to depress the center button on the watch band to get it to slide in to the watch.  That would have been nice to know before I struggled with it.  Overall, I'm very pleased with the product

Great customer service, upon receipt of a malfunctioning adapter of the watchband I purchased. Customer service acknowledged the defect and sent another band free of charge with no hassle.

Review.Titre: As good as Apple, if not better!
Review.Contenu: A great selection of superb quality titanium watch straps for the Apple Ultra watch. I purchased one for my new Ultra 2 as the Apple one I purchased with the watch just looked shabby within a few weeks. The Oyster strap from The Ultra Supply Company fits like a dream. The titanium colour is a perfect match for the watch and the fit on the watch grooves is incredible. As good a quality as the watch itself. As for their customer service, they have been ‘stunning’ in dealing with my queries and shipping. The best customer service I have ever received! Would recommend their quality products and service without any hesitation!

Review.Titre: I recently had a great experience with…
Review.Contenu: I recently had a great experience with Ultra Supply Co. Their products are of exceptional quality, and the customer service was top-notch. The timely delivery and attention to detail in packaging also stood out. Overall, a highly recommendable brand for those seeking reliable and quality supplies.

Arrived on time.  Easy to adjust my wrist measures 8 1/2 inches and had plenty of adjustment.  The watch band matches watch.  Several people have asked about the band realizing I changed from original Apple band.
Nice site, easy to order and delivered quickly, even to the Netherlands, now I hope the product is good.

Review.Titre: Apple Watch Ultra 2 Band - Good Quality
Review.Contenu: Easy ordering. Arrived on time. Ordered the basic grade 2 titanium band. Quality is very good for the price point and site also offers higher quality bands too. Colour is perfect to the Ultra 2. Comes with link tool and instructions with link to video. Band is very large and will accommodate large wrists. I removed 4 links for my fit (larger wrist).
Did a great job! We’re very helpful when shipping got delayed, even offered to send a replacement if they weren’t able to fix it soon.

Review.Titre: Best and most understanding customer service and support
Review.Contenu: Customer service went over and above to help with an issue that I had.   I had worn my new Apple Watch Ultra 2 with the titanium band, while touring with my road bike.  I had a big crash and destroyed my new watch and watchband.  I had asked if there was a way to fix the band, and initially, was told, the links could be replaced, but when I sent a picture, the watchband was replaced completely at no charge.

Review.Titre: Product was very nice and customer…
Review.Contenu: Product was very nice and customer service was great.  I will recommend this company and product to my friends and relatives.
Ordered the titanium oyster on Sunday received on Wednesday.  Quick shipping.  Easy to remove the links.  My wrist measure about 8.5 inches I removed three links and fits good.  Nice looking band.

Review.Titre: Great titanium band for the price
Review.Contenu: I wanted to have a titanium band for my Apple Watch Ultra 2 for more formal occasions. I first tried the more well-known ones (Nomad) that were highly recommended by review websites. Those cost around $299. Turns out that the QA was extremely poor and I couldn't even fit one side of the band into the watch. I then tried the Apple Link Bracelet. That was far more expensive and it is by far the easiest to resize. But it was also extremely uncomfortable for me as my hairs keep getting caught between the links.I decided to take a chance on Ultra Supply, despite it not being as well known as others. For $120, I have to say it is extremely worth it. The finish is impeccable and I can't tell any difference between the titanium on the band and the one on the Apple Watch. It also comes with a DLC coating. Not sure about longevity given that all metal bands are known to scratch easily. The magnetic clasp is also extremely easy to put on or off. The only minor complaint is that resizing is more painful than the Apple Link bracelet, but this is mostly a one-time affair. I doubt you want to be resizing all the time even with the Apple bracelet. In summary, great value for quality at $120. I did not bother to try the $30 China ones on Amazon. I personally have trouble believing any good titanium band can be obtained for $30 and the reviews on those are mostly bot generated (use fakespot to check).

Apart from awesome products, they are beautiful to wear. Just bought my second titanium band for my Apple Ultra, and I just know it won’t be the last. Though not available in EU, their worldwide delivery is quick and prompt. Can’t fault in anything.
The customer service was excellent. One part on the titanium band was defective and they shipped a replacement part promptly . The band was well made and a perfect match for the watch.
if u have a apple ultra watch and looking for a metal band this is the one after removing two links it fits perfectly

Great customer service fast shipping and the bracelet matches the watch perfectly. My only problem is that I am between sizes. The small link makes it just a tad too tight and the larger a tad too loose. If it was possible to get one link in between those two sizes it would be perfect. So in fact I give 4.5 stars lol.
